about_the_game:
This is a puzzle game that combines chess with mechanics like TIME REVERSAL and TIME PIECES. These mechanics introduce a lot of interesting, complex, and deeply strategic gameplay.

Features

  • By consuming energy, you can rewind the game to any previous turn.

  • Pieces temporarily revived through time rewind will still die in the turn they originally did, and this cannot be avoided.
  • Time Pieces are a type of chess piece unaffected by Time Rewinds, whether in terms of movement or life and death.

  • Due to the movement of Time Pieces, a reality overlap may occur at a certain moment in the past.

Intricate Levels

  • The game features several major levels, each progressively introducing you to the various mechanics and gameplay elements of TIME CHESS.
  • Carefully designed levels that consider all possible outcomes across the entire timeline, providing you with an intensely brain-teasing experience.

  • Hidden battle levels are also scattered throughout the map... ~

Battles!

  • In addition to the level mode, there is a battle mode where you can use various preset configurations to play against computer or engage in local multiplayer matches.
  • By collecting hidden battle levels in the level mode, you can unlock more preset configurations.
  • You can set various parameters, and any preset configuration allows you to freely configure Time Pieces.

  • (You can even set up computer vs. computer battles~!)

short_description: This is a chess puzzle game where you can rewind time to any previous move, but the fate of death is unchangeable. Some pieces are unaffected by time and influence all past moves simultaneously. Use these mechanics, including reality overlap, to checkmate the king in the present or the past!
